io.github.dfx81.bot

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • TelegramLongPollingBot
      • io.github.dfx81.bot.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends TelegramLongPollingBot
    Implementation of a Telegram Long Polling Bot. Provide the command handling for the bot and sending responses. Can handle multiple commands at once based on the number of available processors on the system. Extends TelegramLongPollingBot provided by org.telegram.telegrambots

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bot

        public Bot(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor,
           DBManager db)
        The base constructor for the Bot.
        Parameters:
        executor - The ThreadPoolExecutor for the bot to use.
        db - The reference to the DatabaseManager. Allows the bot to access the database.
